summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Focus Drift Detection application. Backend APIs are fully functional (18/18 tests passed). Frontend UI loads correctly with all required elements and data-testid attributes. Real-time tracking works for all metrics including scroll events (with proper debouncing), clicks, mouse movements, and idle time detection. Drift analysis algorithm correctly identifies patterns and provides recommendations. Navigation between landing page and dashboard works seamlessly. Start/stop tracking functionality operates correctly. MongoDB data persistence is working. Application is production-ready.
passed_tests: All tracking event types are logged successfully
Drift analysis algorithm correctly calculates scores and recommendations
Session statistics endpoint returns proper data structure
Drift detection logic identifies excessive scrolling and idle behavior
Landing page loads with all required elements (hero, features, LSTM explanation)
Navigation between landing page and dashboard works
Dashboard auto-starts tracking session on mount
All metric cards display and update in real-time
Scroll events are tracked with proper debouncing (100ms)
Mouse movement tracking works with burst detection
Idle time detection activates after 5+ seconds of inactivity
Drift analysis card shows recommendations and confidence scores
Stop tracking button ends session and shows inactive status
Start tracking button creates new session and shows active status
Back to home navigation works correctly
All data-testid attributes are present for automated testing
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (18/18 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (19/19 features working)
